title: Ocasio-Cortez to endorse Bernie Sanders
text:
Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez plans to endorse Bernie Sanders at a campaign rally on Saturday, according to two Sanders aides, strengthening the Vermont senator’s pull among young liberals.

The influential New York congresswoman’s endorsement will come at a pivotal moment in Sanders' presidential bid, which has stalled in the polls as he faces continued questions about his age and health following a heart attack that curtailed his campaign activities.

Story Continued Below

And Ocasio-Cortez is not the only member of the Squad to get behind Sanders — Rep. Ilhan Omar formally announced her endorsement on Tuesday night.
